name: Ember of Rest
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: If your computer monitor aspect ratio is not 16:9, it is highly recommended to not play the game in fullscreen mode as some UI elements may not function properly.

The Gotlander town of Burs was one of the most prosperous trading centres of Scandinavia - until volcanic eruptions blotted out the sky and a terrible plague spread around the world. The Four Years of Calamity, they will call them. As the king of Burs, you are to manage your kingdom's resources to survive the winter, and make harsh choices which affect future decisions in the game. Will you succumb to the town's historical fate? Or will you find your Ember of Rest?

Made for the 48-hour Burs Game Jam 2022.
